sentences.sContent: Telecommuting, flexitime and job sharing were the main types of flexibility cited in the study published in the Psychologist-Manager journal.
sentences.sContent_eng: Telecommuting, flexitime and job sharing were the main types of flexibility cited in the study published in the Psychologist-Manager journal.
sentences.sCn: 该项在《心理学家与管理人》期刊上发表的研究报告提到，远程办公、弹性工时，以及分工合作是弹性工作制的几种主要形式。

trans.tranOther: a system in which people work a particular number of hours each week or month, but can change the times at which they start and finish each day
